French: Historique des copies de sauvegarde automatiques
Spanish: Historial de copias de seguridad automáticas
Japanese: 履歴を自動バックアップ
参加コード: $1

English: Error loading world file. Check backups!
French: Chargement du fichier de monde impossible. Consultez les copies de sauvegarde !
Italian: Errore nel caricamento del file mondiale. Controlla i backup!
German: Fehler beim Laden der Weltdatei. Überprüfe die Backups!
Spanish: Error al cargar archivo de mundo. Comprueba las copias de seguridad.
Russian: Не удалось загрузить файл мира. Проверьте бэкапы!
Turkish: Dünya dosyası yüklenirken hata oluştu. Yedekleri kontrol et!
Polish: Błąd wczytywania pliku świata. Sprawdź kopie zapasowe!
Portuguese_Brazilian: Erro ao carregar o arquivo do mundo. Confira os backups!
Chinese: 世界文档加载错误。请查看备份！
Chinese_Trad: 載入世界檔案時發生錯誤。請檢查備份！
Japanese: ワールド ファイルの読み込みでエラーが発生しました。バックアップをご確認ください!
Korean: 월드 파일을 로드하는 동안 오류가 발생했습니다. 백업을 확인하세요!

Japanese: クロスプレイ
お気に入り
最近使った項目
サーバーを追加
サーバーの追加に失敗しました!

English: The input is not a valid IP, URL or invite code!
French: Saisie invalide. Changez d'adresse IP/URL ou de code d'invitation !
Italian: Indirizzo IP, URL o codice di invito inseriti non validi.
German: Die Eingabe ist keine gültige IP, URL oder ein Einladungscode!
Spanish: El texto introducido no constituye una IP, URL o código de invitación válidos.
Russian: Это не IP, URL или код приглашения!
Turkish: Bu girdi geçerli bir IP, URL veya davet kodu değil!
Polish: Dane nie są prawidłowym IP, URL lub kodem zaproszenia!
Portuguese_Brazilian: Você inseriu um IP, URL ou código de convite inválido!
Chinese_Trad: 輸入的 IP、URL 或邀請代碼無效！
Japanese: 入力した IP、URL、または招待コードが無効です!
Korean: 입력값이 유효한 IP, URL 또는 초대 코드가 아닙니다!

Italian: Impossibile utilizzare il codice di partecipazione
Spanish: Error al procesar el código de unión
Portuguese_Brazilian: Não foi possível resolver o código de entrada
Japanese: 参加コードを認識できませんでした

French: Entrer l'adresse IP ou le code d'invitation
Italian: Inserisci un indirizzo IP o un codice d'invito
Spanish: Introduce una IP o código de unión
Portuguese_Brazilian: Digite o IP ou código de convite
Chinese_Trad: 輸入 IP 或邀請代碼
Japanese: IP または招待コードを入力

Chinese_Trad: [IP/URL]:[連接埠] 或 [6 位數邀請代碼]
Japanese: [IP/URL]: [ポート] または [6 ケタの招待コード]
サーバーを削除しますか?

Italian: Il tuo spazio di archiviazione nel cloud è pieno!
Spanish: No queda espacio en tu almacenamiento en la nube.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Seu armazenamento na nuvem está cheio!
Chinese_Trad: 您的雲端儲存空間已滿！
Japanese: クラウドストレージに空きがありません!

English: This operation failed because your cloud storage is full. Please move some worlds to local storage and try again.
French: Votre espace de stockage cloud est saturé. Veuillez transférer plusieurs de vos mondes dans votre espace de stockage local avant de réessayer.
Italian: Questa operazione non è riuscita perché il tuo spazio di archiviazione nel cloud è pieno. Sposta alcuni mondi nella memoria interna e riprova.
German: Die Aktion ist fehlgeschlagen, da dein Cloud-Speicher voll ist. Bitte verschiebe einige Welten auf einen lokalen Speicher und versuche es erneut.
Spanish: No se ha podido realizar la operación dado que tu espacio de almacenamiento en la nube está lleno. Mueve algunos mundos al almacenamiento local e inténtalo de nuevo.
Russian: Произошла ошибка, поскольку облачное хранилище заполнено. Пожалуйста, переместите часть миров на свое устройство и повторите попытку.
Turkish: Bulut depolaman dolu olduğu için bu işlem başarısız oldu. Lütfen bazı dünyaları yerel depolamaya taşı ve tekrar dene.
Polish: Operacja nie powiodła się z powodu braku wolnej przestrzeni w chmurze. Przenieś światy do zapisu lokalnego i spróbuj ponownie.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Esta operação falhou pois o seu armazenamento na nuvem está cheio. Mova alguns mundos para o armazenamento local e tente novamente.
Chinese: 此次操作失败，因为您的云存档内存已满。请将其他世界移至本地存档再尝试该操作。
Chinese_Trad: 由於您的雲端儲存空間已滿，此作業失敗。請將部分世界移至本機存放區，然後再試一次。
Japanese: クラウドストレージに空きがないため、操作に失敗しました。ワールドの一部をローカルストレージに移動させて、再度お試しください。
Korean: 클라우드 저장소가 가득 차서 작업을 실패했습니다. 일부 월드를 로컬 저장소로 이동하고 다시 시도하세요.

English: Would you like to save this world to local storage instead?
French: Voulez-vous plutôt sauvegarder ce monde dans un espace de stockage local ?
Italian: Vuoi salvare questo mondo nella memoria interna?
German: Möchtest du diese Welt stattdessen lokal speichern?
Spanish: ¿Prefieres guardar este mundo en almacenamiento local?
Turkish: Bu dünyayı bulut depolama yerine yerel depolamaya kaydetmek ister misin?
Polish: Czy chcesz zamiast tego zapisać ten świat lokalnie?
Portuguese_Brazilian: Em vez disso, você gostaria de salvar este mundo no armazenamento local?
Chinese: 您希望将此世界存入本地存档吗？
Chinese_Trad: 您要改將這個世界儲存到本機存放區嗎？
Japanese: このワールドをローカルストレージに保存しますか?

English: Would you like to save this character to local storage instead?
French: Voulez-vous plutôt sauvegarder ce personnage dans un espace de stockage local ?
Italian: Vuoi salvare questo personaggio nella memoria interna?
German: Möchtest du diesen Charakter stattdessen lokal speichern?
Spanish: ¿Prefieres guardar este personaje en almacenamiento local?
Turkish: Bu karakteri bulut depolama yerine yerel depolamaya kaydetmek ister misin?
Polish: Czy chcesz zamiast tego zapisać tę postać lokalnie?
Portuguese_Brazilian: Em vez disso, você gostaria de salvar este personagem no armazenamento local?
Chinese: 您希望将此角色存入本地存档吗？
Chinese_Trad: 您要改將這個角色儲存到本機存放區嗎？
Japanese: このキャラクターをローカルストレージに保存しますか?

English: To prevent data loss, save data for the current session may be moved to local storage.
French: Afin d'éviter toutes pertes de données, transférez et sauvegardez celles de votre session actuelle dans l'espace de stockage local.
Italian: Per prevenire le perdite di dati, i dati di salvataggio della sessione in corso possono essere spostati nella memoria interna.
German: Um einen Datenverlust zu verhindern, werden Speicherdaten der aktuellen Sitzung ggf. lokal gespeichert.
Spanish: Para evitar pérdidas de datos, los datos de guardado de la sesión actual se podrían guardar en almacenamiento local.
Russian: Чтобы предотвратить потерю данных, текущее сохранение будет перемещено на устройство.
Turkish: Veri kaybını önlemek için mevcut oturumun kayıt verileri yerel depolamaya taşınabilir.
Polish: Dane zapisu bieżącej sesji mogą zostać zapisane lokalnie, by zapobiec utracie danych.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Para evitar perda de dados, os dados salvos da sessão atual podem ser movidos para o armazenamento local.
Chinese: 为防止数据丢失，当前版本数据保存可能被移至本地存储。
Chinese_Trad: 為避免資料遺失，目前工作階段的儲存資料可能已移至本機存放區。
Japanese: データの消失を防止するため、現在のセッションのセーブデータは、ローカルストレージに移動される場合があります。
Korean: 데이터 손실을 방지하기 위해 현재 세션의 저장 데이터를 로컬 저장소로 이동할 수 있습니다.

Japanese: ワールドがすでに存在します!

French: Un monde porte déjà le nom : $1
Italian: Esiste già un mondo con il nome $1
German: Eine Welt namens $1 ist bereits vorhanden.
Chinese: 一个叫 $1 的世界已存在
Chinese_Trad: 名稱為 $1 的世界已經存在
Japanese: ワールド名「$1」は、すでに存在します。
招待を承諾しました!

English: You're about to join a different server!
French: Vous allez rejoindre un autre serveur !
Italian: Stai per accedere a un server diverso!
German: Du bist im Begriff, einem anderen Server beizutreten!
Spanish: Estás a punto de unirte a un servidor diferente.
Russian: Вы собираетесь перейти на другой сервер!
Portuguese_Brazilian: Você está prestes a entrar em um servidor diferente!
Chinese: 你即将加入另一个服务器！
Japanese: 別のサーバーに参加しようとしています!

English: Are you sure you want to log out of the current session?
French: Confirmez-vous vouloir quitter votre session actuelle ?
Italian: Vuoi davvero uscire dalla sessione in corso?
German: Möchtest du dich wirklich von der aktuellen Sitzung abmelden?
Spanish: ¿Seguro que quieres cerrar tu sesión actual?
Turkish: Mevcut oturumu kapatmak istediğine emin misin?
Polish: Czy na pewno chcesz się wylogować z bieżącej sesji?
Portuguese_Brazilian: Você tem certeza que deseja desconectar-se da sessão atual?
Chinese: 您确定要登出当前版本吗？
Chinese_Trad: 您確定要登出目前的工作階段？
Japanese: 本当に現在のセッションからログアウトしてよろしいですか?

French: Valheim est disponible en accès anticipé.
Italian: Valheim è disponibile su Game Preview
Chinese: 英灵神殿在游戏预览中
Japanese: 『Valheim』はゲーム プレビュー中です

English: Some platform- or game features might not work correctly and the game might crash.
French: Certaines plateformes et fonctionnalités inachevées peuvent bloquer le jeu.
Italian: Potrebbero verificarsi problemi con le piattaforme o con alcune funzionalità e il gioco potrebbe subire un arresto anomalo.
German: Einige Plattform- oder Spielfunktionen werden eventuell nicht korrekt ausgeführt und es kann zu Abstürzen kommen.
Spanish: Puede que algunas funciones del juego o la plataforma no funcionen correctamente y el juego se cierre inesperadamente.
Russian: Некоторые функции игры или платформы могут работать неправильно. Игра может самопроизвольно закрыться.
Turkish: Bazı platform veya oyun özellikleri düzgün çalışmayabilir ve oyun çökebilir.
Polish: Niektóre funkcje platformy lub gry mogą nie działać poprawie. Gra może ulec awarii.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Alguns recursos da plataforma ou jogo podem não funcionar corretamente, e o jogo pode parar de funcionar.
Chinese: 一些平台- 或游戏功能可能无法正确运作并且游戏可能会闪退。
Chinese_Trad: 部分平台或遊戲功能可能無法正常運作，並因此導致遊戲當掉。
Japanese: 一部のプラットフォームまたはゲーム機能が正常に動作せず、ゲームがクラッシュする場合があります。
Korean: 일부 플랫폼 또는 게임 기능이 제대로 작동하지 않고 게임이 중단될 수 있습니다.

English: Cloud storage full! World was moved to local storage and saved
French: Espace de stockage cloud saturé ! Le monde a été déplacé dans un espace de stockage local avant d'être sauvegardé.
Italian: Spazio di archiviazione nel cloud pieno! Il mondo è stato spostato nella memoria interna e salvato
German: Cloud-Speicher voll! Welt wurde in den lokalen Speicher verschoben und gespeichert.
Spanish: Espacio de almacenamiento en la nube completo. El mundo se ha guardado en el almacenamiento local.
Russian: Облачное хранилище заполнено! Мир перемещен на устройство и сохранен
Turkish: Bulut depolaması dolu! Dünya yerel depolamaya taşındı ve kaydedildi
Polish: Brak przestrzeni w chmurze! Świat został przeniesiony i zapisany lokalnie
Portuguese_Brazilian: O armazenamento na nuvem está cheio! O mundo foi movido e salvo no armazenamento local
Chinese: 云存档内存已满！世界已被移至本地内存并已保存
Chinese_Trad: 雲端儲存空間已滿！該世界已移至本機存放區並儲存
Japanese: クラウドストレージに空きがありません! ワールドがローカルストレージに移動され、保存されました。
Korean: 클라우드 저장소가 가득 찼습니다! 월드가 로컬 저장소로 이동되어 저장되었습니다.

Japanese: セーブを管理
ワールド
キャラクター
バックアップ数: $1
削除済み
展開する
折りたたむ
バックアップを復元

Italian: Spazio di archiviazione nel cloud utilizzato: $1/$2
Spanish: Almacenamiento en la nube en uso: $1/$2
Japanese: 使用中のクラウドストレージ: $1/$2

French: Restauration de la copie de sauvegarde échouée !
Spanish: Error al restaurar la copia de seguridad.
Japanese: バックアップの復元に失敗しました!
ファイルの移動に失敗しました!

English: Please try again or restart the game if the problem persists
French: Veuillez réessayer ou redémarrer le jeu si le problème persiste.
Italian: Prova di nuovo o riavvia il gioco se il problema persiste
German: Bitte versuche es erneut oder starte das Spiel neu, falls das Problem bestehen bleibt.
Spanish: Inténtalo de nuevo o reinicia el juego si el problema persiste.
Russian: Попробуйте еще раз или перезапустите игру
Turkish: Sorun devam ederse lütfen tekrar dene veya oyunu yeniden başlat
Polish: Spróbuj ponownie lub uruchom grę ponownie, jeśli problem nie zniknie
Portuguese_Brazilian: Tente novamente ou reinicie o jogo se o problema persistir
Chinese: 如问题依然存在，请重试或重启游戏
Chinese_Trad: 請再試一次，如果問題仍然存在，請重新啟動遊戲
Japanese: 問題が引き続き発生する場合は、再度お試しいただくか、ゲームを再起動してください。
Korean: 문제가 지속되면 다시 시도하거나 게임을 다시 시작하세요.

Japanese: バックアップを復元しますか?

English: Deleted file $1 will be restored from $2.
French: Le fichier supprimé $1 sera restauré à partir de $2.
Italian: Il file eliminato $1 verrà ripristinato da $2.
German: Die gelöschte Datei $1 wird von $2 wiederhergestellt.
Spanish: Se restaurará el archivo eliminado $1 a partir de $2.
Portuguese_Brazilian: O arquivo apagado $1 será restaurado de $2.
Chinese: 删除的文件 $1 将从 $2 恢复。
Chinese_Trad: 已刪除的檔案 $1 將從 $2 還原。
Japanese: 削除されたファイル「$1」が「$2」から復元されます。

English: The current version of $1 will be backed up and replaced by $2.
French: La version actuelle de $1 sera remplacée par la copie de sauvegarde $2.
Italian: La versione attuale di $1 verrà salvata e sostituita da $2.
German: Es wird ein Backup der aktuellen Version von $1 erstellt und diese dann durch $2 ersetzt.
Spanish: La versión actual de $1 será sustituida por $2.
Russian: Текущая версия «$1» будет архивирована и заменена на «$2».
Turkish: $1 dosyasının mevcut sürümü yedeklenecek ve $2 ile değiştirilecek.
Polish: Bieżąca wersja $1 zostanie zapisana i zastąpiona przez $2.
Portuguese_Brazilian: A versão atual de $1 será salva e substituída por $2.
Chinese: $1 的当前版本将会被 $2 备份并覆盖。
Chinese_Trad: 目前版本的 $1 將會備份，並改由 $2 取代。
Japanese: 「$1」の現在のバージョンがバックアップされ、「$2」に置き換えられます。
バックアップを削除しますか?

Spanish: Error al mover datos de guardado.
Japanese: セーブを移動不可

English: There's already a save with the name $1 in the destination location.
French: Une sauvegarde du nom de $1 existe déjà dans l'emplacement de destination.
Italian: Esiste già un salvataggio con il nome $1 nella posizione selezionata.
German: Es ist bereits ein Speicherstand mit dem Namen $1 am Zielort vorhanden.
Spanish: Ya existen datos de guardado con el nombre «$1» en la ubicación de destino.
Russian: В месте назначения уже есть сохранение под названием «$1».
Turkish: Hedef konumda zaten $1 adında bir kayıt bulunuyor.
Polish: Zapis z nazwą $1 już istnieje w wybranym miejscu docelowym.
Portuguese_Brazilian: Já existe um jogo salvo chamado $1 no local de destino.
Chinese: 名为 $1 的存档在目标位置已存在。
Chinese_Trad: 目的地位置已經有名稱為 $1 的儲存資料。
Japanese: 移動先の場所に「$1」という名前のセーブがすでに存在します。
Korean: 대상 위치에 이름이 $1인 저장이 이미 있습니다.

English: Please check the Player.log file for more information
Can't create a character with this name
Can't create a world with this name
Your platform privilege settings prevent you from viewing user generated content. Text from other players will be heavily filtered.
You can only join servers running version $1
Your platform account settings prevent you from accessing online multiplayer.
Error loading world file. Check backups!
A freshwater fish that needs a lot of seasoning.
Spending its whole life in the dark, it has no need for eyes.
This fish is a nuisance in the local streams.
Fermented, this fish will smell worse than the swamp it came from.
Best served with lots of carbs!
It has seen some things... Some very haunting things...
The dangling light makes it easier to see that pretty little face!
This fish likes the water to be almost freezing cold.
Some say this fish lays its eggs directly in molten lava!
Tasty when cooked right, but the flavour has a bit of a sting.
This bait doesn't look like much, but it's a treat to fish that live where it's cold and dark.
It might smell foul, but the fish drawn to this bait are used to so much worse.
Dead trolls in the forest often attract a fish or two, speed up the process with this bait!
You're not immune to deathsquito bites, and the fish here aren't immune to this snack!
This bait sinks deep, deep enough to lure the fish swimming along the very bottom of the sea.
A bait to guide the fish to you through shrouded waters.
Some fish already like it where the waters are warm, and this bait brings the temperature close to boiling.
It's not very nutritious, so the only fish that'll take this bait are the ones that are used to just eating ice.
Stamina drain and pull speed when fishing.
This recipe requires only one of the shown ingredients.
Take me to the river.. Drop me in the water..
I'm a perch, not a bass!
You're supposed to put heads on a pike, not put a pike on a wall...
I've got this tune stuck in my head...
It's so cold... And dark... But I like it that way.
Stop it with the baiting already!
What's that nasty smell? Surely it couldn't be me!
I'm dead, but not gone. Won't you free me from this cursed purgatory?
Do you ever wonder what lurks in the deepest parts of the ocean? Don't. It's better not to know.
Do you see the light? It beckons you...
Once I was free to jump upstream. But no longer.
Please lay me to rest by the fire...
Have you seen my friend around? Her name is Anika.
Damage and Eitr usage when using elemental magic.
Damage, eitr & health drain when using blood magic.
The sweltering heat of Muspelheim seems almost pathetic when compared to what this staff can do...
A staff as cold as the three-year winter that will herald the end of times.
Sacrifice a bit of blood to raise the dead. Upgrade the skull to spawn multiple skeletons, and increase your blood magic to make them stronger.
Your Dead raiser is not strong enough to control more summons.
For a slight blood offering it will protect the caster in a magical shell.
A magical shield that absorbs damage
It still fizzes softly with ancient memories.
A bound wisp to guide you through the thickest of mists.
You are infused with a strange Dvergr power that increases your strength.
All chickens bear the ancestral curse of being delicious.
When you crack open their shells, the meat within is tender and succulent.
Succulent white meat, a true delicacy.
Keep it warm to see what comes out.. but what came first, really?
The meat of a hare is scant but toothsome.
Placeholder item for Seeker Queen item drop.
Faster mining and increased Eitr regeneration.
What is gravity but an effect of entropy?
You think you beat us? Think again... We are still, and forever will be the hive - and the hive is unbeatable.
A sleek bolt of dark metal.
A crude bolt of yellowed bone.
Using this bow is backbreaking work, but so worth it.
As deadly as it is shiny, and it's very shiny.
The faint glow seems to slice through the mist.
It might not be a hammer, but Thor himself would still approve of this weapon.
Not even the giants of old could weather the poisonous bite of this weapon.
This mighty sledge yearns to wreak havoc.
Stab once for those who've betrayed you, and twice for those you hate.
The ancient root is pulsating with energy
The ancient root's glow is fading
The ancient root seems all dried up
Sacred blood from the Great Tree.
Godflesh, wood from the Great Tree.
Sorcery shows itself in the eyes, so most mages wear cowls to disguise their occult pursuits.
These artfully layered robes have spells and charms sewn into every seam and fold.
The trousers worn by mages are always especially tight. Discomfort fuels the focus that is needed for magic...
People might say you look like a giant ant. But they will only say it once.
A breastplate crafted from the burnished carapace of a giant insect.
Keep that wisplight close, you don't want to lose it.
You never know what you'll find out there in the mist.
What's Midgard like, then? I've only ever heard the tales.
Do all humans look like you? You're so...nevermind.
It's easy to loose track of the days out here...
Us dvergr watch out for our own kin.
Blasted seekers! I wish they'd all just shrivel up and die.
I almost got completely drained by a tick once... But dvergr don't die that easily.
It's a bit strange to think this was all once a great battlefield...
If we could come through to here, it makes you wonder what else might...
My knees are aching, but at least we have food and a warm fire.
If you work and keep tidy, Friday brings money.
This little fort is nothing compared to our strongholds at home...
When is it dinner time? I'm hungry.
Are we running out of ale? I think we're running out of ale...
Some repairs to this place wouldn't hurt.
I don't get why they didn't just take everything when they left the mines. Why leave the Cores there?
Damned seekers smashed our Black Cores! Back into the deep then, I guess...
This world has changed so much since our people were here last, imagine what it'll look like in another couple of centuries!
I wouldn't do that if I were you.
Touch that again and I'll chop your hand off.
We're not to be trifled with!
You'd best be real careful. Or things will go badly for you.
Enjoy shooting yourself in the foot, eh? I can help with that!
So it's a fight you're after, then?
I'll mop the floors with your guts!
So you're the one who's been causing such a ruckus.
Hello. You've travelled a long way.
Always watch out for the gjall.
Maybe we'll meet again, maybe not.
I hope this mine isn't as infested as the last.
I wonder if we can bring this shipment home soon.
Do you ever wonder what happened to Haldor?
Those seekers are not to be messed with...
I remember yet, the giants of yore...
We built these mines, you know? And now look at us...
These pests have spread further than I feared. At this rate, all our old mines will be overtaken.
It must be strange, being human. Imagine having to crawl through small spaces!
Is it true that there's no magic in Midgard?
We're only good hosts as long as you're a good guest.
You're close to overstaying your welcome, Norseman.
If you do that again, you won't like what happens.
I'll show you what magic can do!
You really shouldn't have done that!
The boiled pork has been fried now, alright!
I'll teach you not to mess with us!
I'll send you to where the pipe bends!
"You are one with the Eitr (Increase regen + Elemental Magic skill)"
A good strong pick of glistening dark metal.
A block of solid stone, seamed with shifting colors.
Bounty from both land and sea.
A delicious omelette with an earthy aftertaste.
Made with sap from the great tree, even a mouthful imparts a warm glow to your whole body.
A quivering jelly with a taste like gentle electricity.
Swollen with magic, these golden orbs bubble from the ground where the Jotun fell.
The delicate blue magecaps crackle like nerve-endings with sorcerous vitality.
It's frankly a little troubling that you would consider hanging these on your wall...
Be careful not to puncture this while you carry it...
The hand of man could hardly design a more perfect weapon.
Caustic bile drawn from the corpse of a gjall.
These are said to bring luck. But not for their original owner.
These are said to bring luck. But not for their original owner.
Less delicate than they look. The leather of the wings catches the firelight as if remembering flight.
Less delicate than they look. The leather of the wings catches the firelight as if remembering flight.
Troll trap is not ready yet
Defensive structure that shoots missiles at anything that gets in its way.
These thick missiles can punch through the hide of even the toughest foes.
Sturdy wooden missiles that can provide a tough defense against foes.
The ballista is already loaded with
A mysterious contraption built by the Dvergrs used to build traps.
One person's scrap is another person's treasure.
Made from natural fibers and dvergr hair.
This is the stuff of life, the poison that consumes itself. The Dvergr refine it to use in their esoteric designs.
The head of a fallen champion.
The head of a fallen champion.
A fragment of a Dvergr sealbreaker.
An object used to break a Dverger seal.
Heavy and pointy, this one's gonna hurt.
The remains of Yagluth, a twisted spirit torn between this world and the next.

Here lie the Jotunn, most ancient of all Odin's kin and fiercest of all his adversaries. In life they were bringers of ruin but now, in death, they nurture new growth.

What is living must die, and what is dead must be born again.

Where the air is thick with magic
And the earth is quick with life,
The mist breeds wonders.
Trust nothing in the mist. I passed through here in a group of seven people but every time we stopped to count, we counted eight. We do not know who the eighth was, but by morning they were gone.

The Dvergr are the descendants of the great smiths of old, delvers in the deep earth, seekers of hidden treasure.

Here in Valheim they mine the bones of the Jotunn and distill eitr, the stuff of magic. If left alone, they are happy with their own plans and care little for the lives of others, but when raised they will defend themselves.

The raven showed me how to make a staff that set my beard on fire. I will meddle no more with such things.

Weary of mist and magic, Ulf carved this stone. Now I go to find a less troublesome place.

Heed the words of Ulf and do not take the hats of the short ones from their heads. They have no sense of a jest and the only cure for insulting them is to kill them. Also, their hats do not fit common heads.

Wanderers in fog,
Where do you go?
Not knowing what you were,
Nor seeing where you go.

In your dream, you walk through a hall of smiling warriors and gracious maidens. You join with their mirth until you realise that you are naked and the small bronze shield you are carrying is not enough to cover your shame.

You greet the morning with gratitude.

Dark-eyed Loki approaches you in your dream and gifts you a ring for each hand. He tells you that as long as they stay on your fingers, you will never hear an insulting word again.

You wake with your fingers in your ears.

You climb a winding staircase, curled tightly within a tall tower, until you arrive at the top and look out over an endless forest.

The wind blows green waves across the tree-tops and beneath the surface, dark shapes stir...
Donning this cape makes you feel lighter, almost as if you could fly!
Filled to the brim with ancient power.
Looks like a perfect piece for piercing something...
Attracts wisps, they mostly come at night...mostly
The wisps wants more open space
It's old and oxidized but can be smelted and used again.
It can hold a lot of mead!
Sharpened to jagged perfection, this spear is sure to be deadly.
The skull of a seeker is solid but not heavy, which makes it perfect for a small and agile shield.
The almost unbreakable carapace of your enemies makes an excellent shield.
A simple torch would just be so old fashioned.
The gate is sealed. The key is scattered and hidden, deep in the mines, so it might never again be unsealed. The gate is sealed.
Grilled to perfection. Makes both eyes and mouths water.

It seems you have had a sip from an yggrasil branch, and I bet you found it to your liking.
Those fun colored lights you may see spinning around you might not all be in your head anymore.
Just don't make it a habit. There may be some long term effects that are anything but magical.

Kraa! Although severed from the trunk, I can see that magic still lingers in the roots of the old ash.

Needless to say, no weapon of your design will be able to break the bark. You need something better, fashioned by more capable hands.
Shadows of an ancient age. The Jotunn once ruled the 10th world, until their time ran out and they were ousted by some other power.
Kraa! Pick their bones and break their domes!

These are the Dvergrhomes, built long ago in a gilded age... Their splendour rivalled the Golden Hall itself!

Regrettably, nothing can last forever. The halls below and the treasures left within are now guarded by more sinister lodgers.

As I am sure my lesser brother tells you, the halls beyond are very impressive...

Just try not to get lost in the winding tunnels and secret passageways will you?

Trying your hand at scrying the runes are you? I'm impressed, sorceror!

Charms and conjurations will take their toll. If you wish to master the arts you must find appropriate sustenance. As it happens, the parts around here are looking ripe with all sorts of delicious new ingredients to gather. Lucky you!

Warrior, what kind of contraption is this?! It looks dangerous...

There is a grinding funnel up here, I wonder what you will put into it.

A strange edifice indeed. I wonder what it will attract. Let us just perch here for a while and see what happens...


Warrior, I am bored. Besides, it is not my job to babysit the likes of you long into the night... Just be vigilant and I'm sure you will rewarded.
Kra-kraaa! Stubborn fools! The Dvergr will tolerate strangers and vagrants but they are quick to anger should you upset them... Which I am sure you will manage to do sooner or later.

Take care, warrior. You've happened upon an outpost of the forlorn Dvergr clans, long since separated from their kin in Nidavellir. Trapped here they still toil, expecting reprieve that will never come. It is a sad fate...

Kraa! Well met, wanderer… I am Munin, brother to Hugin. I bring greetings from the Allfather. His eye sees through mine, I carry his words beneath my tongue. Keep his ways and I will come to you again…

Born in armour,
Mother of many.
Queen without crown,
Ruler beneath.
We sealed the door and scattered the key. Leave her be.
Tell Odin that my kin will bring forth another... A monarch never dies.

The mists permeate all that live and grow in these lands, and now it is a part of you as well.

With Eitr you will be able to cast all sorts of powerfull spells. Try to find more Eitr-infused ingredients to increase your ability.
I have a tale or two to tell.
Busy, warrior? I can come back later...
